node.title: The science fiction writer who most personifies Perl is:
node.author: apl

data.field: [http://www.merlinsilk.com/2007/08/10/the-man-who-was-too-lazy-to-fail/|Robert Heinlein] (for writing The Man Who Was Too Lazy to Fail) [http://www.antipope.org/charlie/fiction/faq.html|Charlie Stross] (for being a Perl programmer) [wp://Vernor Vinge] (computer scientist, who shows us TIMTOWTDI) [wp://Douglas Adams] (The universe is the result of some (perl) [http://www.quotationspage.com/quote/8.html|obfuscation] contest ;-) [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stanis%C5%82aw_Lem|Stanislaw Lem] for writing [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Cyberiad|The Cyberiad] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Zelazny|Roger Zelazny] for writing [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_of_Shadows|Jack of Shadows] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Niven|Larry Niven] for a central premise in his Known Space universe, that [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierson%27s_Puppeteer|aliens] secretly bred humans for 'luckiness' Other
